name: The Beverly Hills Plastic Surgeon
body:
Plasetic surgery is usually not covered by insurance in most countries and individuals will have to fund the operations of their own funding. Through interviews with patients in the Beverly Hills plastic surgeon program before and after cosmetic surgery , people are able to understand the psychological effects of impacts and effects associated with the different cosmetic surgery.

![tummy tuck beverly hills](http://www.drteitelbaum.com/sites/default/files/scroller2_0.jpg)

Reconstructive surgery on the other hand involves the restoration of the form of the various parts of the body can be deformed either by physical trauma , disease or birth abnormality . In most countries, reconstructive surgery is covered by insurance. In Beverly Hills plastic surgeon program , individuals who need reconstructive surgery obtained through operation. Apart from this , people become aware of the various surgical options available and the impact of surgery to improve the lives of patients. The most common reconstructive breast reconstruction surgery . This is mainly done for survivors of breast cancer who have had breast or breast removed to contain the disease . Apart from the awareness of the impact of surgery , the program also provides information on places you can get help if you are in need of reconstructive surgery.
